function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation, myths, and conspiracy theories about COVID-19 spread through AI on social media","Impact":"Potential to mislead the public and undermine trust in public health measures","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking algorithms, promote verified information, and provide transparent sources","Technologies":"AI algorithms for content moderation and fact-checking","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate data security and privacy measures for the collected health data","Impact":"Potential for data breaches, unauthorized access, and privacy violations","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption, data anonymization, and strict access controls","Technologies":"Data encryption, blockchain for data integrity, access control mechanisms","People":"Patients, caregivers, researchers","Owner":"Application developers, data custodians"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to public health measures due to surveillance and tracking methods","Impact":"Privacy concerns, reluctance to consent, and potential resistance to public health efforts","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, opt-in consent, and strict data protection regulations","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving techniques, secure data storage, and transparent data usage policies","People":"General public","Owner":"Government health authorities"}]}
